sect2.title: Remove all Guides
sect2.para: The Remove all Guides command removes all guides from the image. Clicking-and-dragging one or two guides onto a ruler is a quicker way to remove them. This command is useful if you have positioned several guides.

sect3.title: Activating the Command
sect3.para:
You can access this command from the main menu through
Image Guides Remove all guides .
